requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100+ or AMD Ryzen3-1300X+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950+ or Radeon R7 360+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compatible with Direct Sound

results.name: Projectionist and the search for hearts
